tool_description: Validates soil testing data for completeness, accuracy, and compliance with standard testing procedures, identifying outliers and missing values.

sample_ids.description: List of sample IDs to validate

validation_standard.description: Testing standard to validate against: ASTM, AASHTO, or BS

outlier_threshold.description: Standard deviation threshold for outlier detection

required_tests.description: List of required test types that must be present

tolerance_level.description: Validation strictness: strict, standard, or lenient

error_messages: Invalid sample IDs: One or more sample IDs do not exist in the dataset.
Unsupported validation standard: Use one of [ASTM, AASHTO, BS].
Invalid outlier threshold: Must be a positive number between 1.0 and 5.0.
Unknown test types in required_tests: Specified test types are not recognized.
Invalid tolerance level: Use one of [strict, standard, lenient].
usage: Specify sample_ids and validation_standard to check data quality. Configure outlier_threshold, required_tests, and tolerance_level as needed.

valid_samples.description: Number of samples that passed validation

invalid_samples.description: Number of samples that failed validation

missing_data.description: Sample IDs with missing required data
